actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing release of documents by the Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management of the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

summary.text: Authorizes the Chairman of the Senate Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management of the Committee on Governmental Affairs to provide investigative documents relating to the hearings on "Oversight of Federal Procurement Decisions on Wedtech" to the Department of Justice.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing release of documents by the Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management of the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
